Detailed Description

An abstract class that defines the common interface for the opening and parsing of a resource file.

It can be treated as a factory that reads in the file and produces handles to accessing the various section of the file parsed.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef ConstSmartPointer<DataHandle> DataHandle::ConstDataHandlePtr

ConstDataHandlePtr can be treated as a const pointer.

typedef SmartPointer<DataHandle> DataHandle::DataHandlePtr

DataHandlePtr can be treated as a normal pointer.

Member Function Documentation

const std::string & DataHandle::errorMessage ( void   ) 

This method is used to quietly obtain some user-meaningful text describing the error that has occurred.

Returns:
A string containing the error message.

DataHandle::Error DataHandle::errorState ( void   )  [inline]

This method is used to determine if the last operation resulted in success or a failure.

The actual return value signifies the error that occurred.

Returns:
The error code.

const std::string & DataHandle::fileName ( void   ) 

This method returns the file-name.

Returns:
A const string containing the file name of the resource.
